comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: The correct spelling is "von Heidenstam". He was a Swedish poet and novelist who got the Nobel Prize in Literature 1916. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Verner_von_Heidenstam

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: B-59:  Thank you for catching the spelling error and providing a bit more about von Heidenstam. We will fix and expand the record.
